New Records: Harry Kane marked his 100th game for England with two goals.
Key Match Events: Harry Kane scored twice to secure a 2-0 victory for England over Finland.
Noni Madueke assisted Harry Kane's second goal.
Harry Kane received a standing ovation when substituted off.
Pre-Game Insights: Harry Kane was presented with a golden cap before kickoff and played in gold boots.
Interim England manager Lee Carsley took over after Gareth Southgate stepped down following England's loss to Spain in the Euro 2024 final.
Post-Match Reflections: Lee Carsley secured his second straight 2-0 win as interim manager.
There is a possibility that Lee Carsley could remain in the position for a while longer if the search for Southgate's permanent successor extends beyond the next international break in October.
Miscellaneous Highlights: England is playing in the second tier of the Nations League and is level on six points at the top of its group with Greece.
